findCompoundInterestPaid(Date, int, double, Frequency, double, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Calculates how much would be paid in interest over the life of a loan.
findContributionAmount(Date, Date, Frequency, double, double, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Finds the needed regular contribution amount to hit a goal by the requested goal date taking into account the expected return rate.
findGoalAmount(Date, Date, Contribution, double, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Find the goal amount given the goalDate and contribution.
findGoalDate(Date, Contribution, double, double) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Given the next contribution date, recurring contribution (amount and frequency that is not one time), goal amount, and current amount this method calculates what end date would have us reaching the goal amount.
findGoalDate(Date, double, Frequency, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Deprecated.
- use findGoalDateSimpleInterest or findGoalDateCompoundInterest, this method does not take into account the interest rate
findGoalDateCompoundInterest(Date, int, double, Frequency, double, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Calculates when a debt payment will be reduced to zero taking into account interest that is assumed to be compounded daily, and a payment that is being made regularly to the debt.
findGoalDateSimpleInterest(Date, int, double, Frequency, double, double, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Calculate a goal date for a simple daily interest loan.
findGoalDateWithInterest(Date, Date, Contribution, double, double, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Calculates the goal date of a savings account with a contribution and interest accumulation
findInterestEarned(Date, Date, Contribution, double, double, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Calculates the interest earned on a savings account with interest accumulation given the goal amount that is trying to be reached.
findPaymentAmountCompoundInterest(Date, int, Date, Frequency, double, double) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Finds the necessary payment amount to pay the debt down to zero by the goal date taking into account interest that compounds daily
findPaymentAmountSimpleInterest(Date, int, Date, Frequency, double, double, double) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Unimplemented
findSimpleInterestPaid(Date, int, double, Frequency, double, double, double, Date) - Static method in class com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Prediction
Finds the total interest paid when paying off a loan using the given payment amount and interest rate.
